title: The Shawshank Redemption
plotSummary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Forrest Gump
plotSummary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

castList.name: Siobhan Fallon Hogan
castList.character:
School Bus Driver 
  
  
  (as Siobhan J. Fallon)

title: Pulp Fiction
plotSummary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster & his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Godfather
plotSummary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Fight Club
plotSummary: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

title: Back to the Future
plotSummary: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: The Big Lebowski
plotSummary: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
plotSummary: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

title: Donnie Darko
plotSummary: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after he narrowly escapes a bizarre accident.

title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
plotSummary: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

title: The Breakfast Club
plotSummary: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

title: Napoleon Dynamite
plotSummary: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
plotSummary: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

title: Rushmore
plotSummary: The extracurricular king of Rushmore Preparatory School is put on academic probation.

title: Ghostbusters
plotSummary: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

title: Candyman
plotSummary: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

title: Hackers
plotSummary: Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

title: Spirited Away
plotSummary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: WarGames
plotSummary: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

title: Rad
plotSummary: The story of one young man, Cru Jones, who has the intensity and desire to win a BMX race called Helltrack.
